word: C. D. RHODES--I UNDERSTAND THAT WAS THE TIME WHEN THE GENERAL CONFERENCE WAS GATHERING EVERYTHING INTO ITS OWN HANDS, THE TIME WHEN THE PUBLISHING HOUSE DID NOT HAVE A WORD TO SAY ABOUT THE BOOK BUSINESS. THEY SIMPLY TOOK THE THING UP, AND ATTEMPTED TO SWALLOW THE REVIEW AND HERALD, TOO. IT MAY BE I AM WRONG ABOUT THAT.
